page.title: 17Families - Cathy
page.content: My name is Cathy Block and I live near the heath in Blackheath. I have a brother who is 5 years old - I am 7. My dad is a printer and he works in Halesworth. I have lots of cousins who live in London, Halesworth and Wenhaston. I get up at 7 o'clock and I get myself dressed and have breakfast. I like Weetabix with milk. After breakfast I get ready for school. If the weather is bad, Mummy takes me in the camper, but if not, we walk. When I get to school, I do my work - I like it. My favourite is reading. We go out to play at half past ten. We have 15 minutes break. At 12 o'clock we have our dinner. School ends at a quarter past three. We go on our holidays in our camper. This year we went to Belgium, France, Switzerland and Germany. I help Mum cook the food, but I like shopping too.
